reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) all of GRSJ 101, GRSJ 102 or (b) all of WMST 101, WMST 102. (or third-year standing.)
Remaining seats will be open to general registration as of July 4, 2017
description: Feminist scholarship emphasizing languages and processes of representation and the construction of difference in cultural discourses and institutions.
